precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Place the tongs in your right hand with your left hand.
Position the thumb on one side of the tongs and the other four fingers on the other side.
Pick up one ball at a time with the tongs.
Transfer the ball to the towel.
Repeat the third and fourth steps for all three balls.
After all balls are transferred to the towel, pick up one ball at a time from the towel
Transfer the ball back to the bowl.
Repeat the last two steps until all balls are back in the bowl.
